Description:
Experience how C3 AI Agentic Process Automation transforms enterprise work. Unlike rules-based RPA systems or rigid workflow engines, C3 AI Agentic Process Automation enables end-users to describe and execute sophisticated workflows. C3 AI Agentic Process Automation can leverage all data types â€” including both enterprise and external data. It can describe both fully automated and human-in-the-loop workflows with intelligence, reliability, and adaptability at scale.
